about_the_game:
No kill streaks. No pay to win. No random spawns. No BS. Just FPS.
Competitive, objective-oriented gameplay, featuring three layers of anti-cheat including EQU8

Tip of the Spear: Task Force Elite is an online multiplayer shooter with competitive gameplay inspired by military FPS titles from the late 1990s and early 2000s. Nostalgic gameplay upgraded to 2021, featuring an unique blend of run-and-gun gameplay and a fast time to kill, players wage war across Middle Eastern streets, Arctic bases, underground tunnels and rolling terrains up to 6 square miles (16 square kilometers)



Storm a casino, raid tunnels, siege a bank, and secure an abandoned airfield.

Join one of the clans already on the game and play competitive matches or casually with your friends, in one of the many public servers, in your own clan server or start your own! Clan matches are played every weekend and the first tournament, community organized, is ongoing.

22 Maps available and more on the way:





Levels feature designated enemy spawn points, ensuring the opposing team never randomly spawns behind players. Re-enlist for classic game modes, including Team King of the Hill (TKOTH), Team Deathmatch (TDM), Capture the Flag (CTF), and Deathmatch (DM), with additional game modes (including PvE/coop) in active development. Engage in close quarters urban combat, or rain fire from above in AI-controlled helicopters that you can command!

  • Team King of the Hill (TKOTH): In TKOTH, two teams spawn at opposite ends of the map and capture Outposts along the way to the center objective. Control the zone in the objective area to crown your team as the King of the Hill!
  • Capture the Flag (CTF): Venture into enemy territory in CTF to pick up an enemy flag and return it to the flag bay at your team's base. Some flags may even be in the enemy team's camp! Can your team survive the trip the lion's den and make it out to tell the tale?
  • Team Deathmatch (TDM): The iconic TDM game mode features a unique twist with Outposts, which are spread across the map to enable your team new locations to spawn on. Capture all Outposts to control the map and rack up more kills than the enemy team!
  • Deathmatch/Free-for-All (DM): It's a free-for-all in the classic Deathmatch game mode! Tip of the Spear's classic FPS gameplay shines bright in this purist FPS environment. Fight your way into the top 3!



    Notable Features:
  • Run-and-gun infantry FPS gameplay
  • Proprietary netcode for low ping action. (ie: American players can play versus European players with very acceptable speed and vice-versa)
  • Board AI-controlled helicopters with preset paths and command the AI pilot: rain bullets from above, or attempt a daring rooftop insertion
  • Gameplay inspired by classic military FPS titles from the late 1990s and early 2000s upgraded to 2021 standards.
  • Designated bases prevent enemies from randomly spawning behind players
  • Four game modes: Team Deathmach, Team King of the Hill, Capture the Flag, and Deathmatch (more in development, including coop/PvE)
  • 22 maps featuring a mix of close quarters combat and terrain-based warfare (more maps and a community map editor in development)
  • No Gated Content
  • Free Support & Updates
  • Competitive gameplay designed for clan battles
  • Host your own server with your own rules, favorite maps and weapon selections through a proprietary server manager tool available on Steam Tools or through official server partner
  • Planned support for Steam Workshop for community levels and Mod Support

    Features in development for Early Access are subject to change.

    Weapons available




    Available on Steam Library > Tools (for free)
    Host your own server(s) with your own rules. Ban weapons, select maps, force map rotation or allow map vote. Set banned words, ban or kick players, start a match, host a private password-protected server, and much more through our Proprietary server tool.




    Join our official discord server:


    ======================
    PATCH NOTES
    ======================

    See for a historical list of patch notes.

content_descriptors.notes:
Tip of the Spear: Task Force Elite contains spurts of blood when players are shot or stabbed. The spurts of blood are not especially realistic, but they tend to be large. Blood does not splatter onto walls. 

Mild shouts of pain/agony occur when players are shot, but the shouting is not extreme or realistic. 

The game does NOT feature "gibbing" or dismemberment. Some death animations tend to be realistic, while others are ragdoll.

Online player interaction, including text and voice chat, may include profanity. Some lines of character dialogue may also contain profanity.

detailed_description:
No kill streaks. No pay to win. No random spawns. No BS. Just FPS.
Competitive, objective-oriented gameplay, featuring three layers of anti-cheat including EQU8

End-User License Agreement (EULA) for Tip of the Spear: Task Force Elite

This End-User License Agreement (the "Agreement") is a legal agreement between you (the "User" or "You") and Red Spear Studios (the "Developer" or "We") for the use of the game "Tip of the Spear: Task Force Elite" (the "Game"). Ownership:

2.2. You acknowledge that you have no ownership or proprietary rights in the Game, except for the limited license granted under this Agreement.

a) Copy, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of the Game;
b) Reverse engineer, disassemble, or decompile the Game or any part thereof;
c) Remove, alter, or obscure any copyright, trademark, or other proprietary notices displayed in or on the Game;
d) Use the Game for any unlawful or unauthorized purpose;
e) Use the Game to infringe upon the rights of others, including intellectual property rights;
f) Engage in any activity that disrupts or interferes with the Game or its servers;
g) Use any unauthorized third-party software or cheat programs in connection with the Game;
h) Sell, rent, lease, sublicense, or transfer your rights or access to the Game to any third party.

User Content:
4.1. The Game may allow you to create or submit user-generated content (such as game mods, custom maps, or other creations).
4.2. By creating or submitting user-generated content, you grant the Developer a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, perpetual, and irrevocable license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, distribute, and display such content in connection with the Game.
4.3. You represent and warrant that you have all necessary rights and permissions to create or submit user-generated content and that such content does not infringe upon the rights of any third party.

Termination:
5.1. This Agreement is effective until terminated.
5.2. The Developer may terminate this Agreement at any time without notice if you fail to comply with its terms.
5.3. Upon termination, you must immediately cease all use of the Game and uninstall/delete any copies of the Game in your possession.

Disclaimer of Warranty:
6.1. The Game is provided "as is" without any warranty of any kind, whether express or implied.
6.2. The Developer does not warrant that the Game will be error-free or uninterrupted, or that any defects in the Game will be corrected.
6.3. You assume all risks associated with the use of the Game, including but not limited to the risk of loss of data or damage to your device.

Limitation of Liability:
7.1. To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, Limitation of Liability (continued):

7.1. To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, in no event shall the Developer be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with the use or inability to use the Game, even if the Developer has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
7.2. The Developer shall not be liable for any loss or damage to your data or devices resulting from the use of the Game.
7.3. Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of liability for incidental or consequential damages, so the above limitations may not apply to you.

Indemnification:
8.1. You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold the Developer harmless from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses (including reasonable attorney's fees) arising out of or in connection with your use of the Game, your breach of this Agreement, or your violation of any rights of any third party.

Governing Law:
9.1. This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Arab Emirates, without regard to its conflict of laws principles.
9.2. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the United Arab Emirates.

Miscellaneous:
10.1. This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between you and the Developer regarding the Game and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous agreements, understandings, or representations.
10.2. If any provision of this Agreement is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall continue in full force and effect.
10.3. The Developer's failure to enforce any right or provision of this Agreement shall not be deemed a waiver of such right or provision.
10.4. The Developer may assign or transfer this Agreement, in whole or in part, without your consent. You may not assign or transfer this Agreement without the Developer's prior written consent.

By installing, accessing, or playing the Game, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by the terms and conditions of this End-User License Agreement. If you do not agree with any of the terms or conditions, you must not install or use the Game.

name: Task Force Elite

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD Ryzen 5 @ 3.6 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers

short_description: Tip of the Spear: Task Force Elite is a multiplayer FPS with old school roots. Engage in infantry combat across urban and terrain-based maps in classic game modes, like Team King of the Hill, and master a realistic ballistics system to snipe the enemy from a mile away.
supported_languages:
English*, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, German, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
